events.name: First Code Academy Summer Camps Info Session 2018
events.description:
Learn to think by learning to code.
Know more about First Code Academy's pedagogy and comprehensive roadmap designed for students as young as 4 years old.
Come join us for an Info Session! Learn more about the course content, hear from the instructors, and discover what it means for your child to learn at First Code Academy.Please feel free to let us know if you have any questions in the meantime. Contact us: hellosg@firstcodeacademy.com | 6820 2633 


Shaping Future Creators
First Code Academy is a leading education institute that teaches kids coding courses and develop curriculum for K-12 students to learn not just coding skills, but computational thinking. Our goal is to empower children and teenagers to become creative leaders in the digital era, for their future career and for driving social change.
events.location: First Code Academy, 04-13 Stamford Court, 61 Stamford Road, Singapore 178892

events.name: WooCommerce Workshop for Women
events.description: [ Free, for women only — please register at http://bit.ly/wooworkm ] Want to learn more about WooCommerce and WordPress, and get better at using them for work? Come join our friends from Automattic for a day of learning and networking! During the first half of this interactive workshop, you’ll learn how to install and configure a WooCommerce store from scratch. You’ll set up a complete site and tinker with core features like Products, Orders, Taxes, and Shipping. In the second session, we’ll build an e-learning site that sells knowledge-based products. We’ll dive into the WooCommerce Memberships and Subscriptions extensions, as well as the Sensei plugin. This event is aimed at students, freelancers, and any other women who are interested in developing their WooCommerce knowledge. All participants who finish the workshop will receive a certificate of completion. Entry is completely free, but seats are limited. Make sure you book yours today! 9:30am - Registration9:45am - 10:30am - Setup10:30am - 12:30pm: Session 112.30pm - 1:30pm: Lunch1.30pm - 3:30pm: Session 24:00pm - 6:00pm: Networking & Afternoon Tea
events.location: Royal Plaza on Scotts, 25 Scotts Road, Singapore
